definitions.definition: to put your foot on something or to press something down with your foot:
examples: I kept treading on his toes when we were dancing.
He trod heavily and reluctantly up the stairs.

definitions.definition: to float vertically in the water by moving the legs and the arms up and down
the pattern of raised lines on a tyre that prevents a vehicle from sliding on the road:
examples: The tread on your tyres is very worn.
